npm-install.js(2,5): error TS2683: 'this' implicitly has type 'any' because it does not have a type annotation.
npm-install.js(4,49): error TS7006: Parameter 'next' implicitly has an 'any' type.
npm-install.js(6,6): error TS7006: Parameter 'args' implicitly has an 'any' type.
npm-install.js(11,9): error TS7009: 'new' expression, whose target lacks a construct signature, implicitly has an 'any' type.


==== npm-install.js (4 errors) ====
    function Installer () {
        this.args = 0
        ~~~~
!!! error TS2683: 'this' implicitly has type 'any' because it does not have a type annotation.
    }
    Installer.prototype.loadArgMetadata = function (next) {
                                                    ~~~~
!!! error TS7006: Parameter 'next' implicitly has an 'any' type.
        // ArrowFunction isn't treated as a this-container
        (args) => {
         ~~~~
!!! error TS7006: Parameter 'args' implicitly has an 'any' type.
            this.args = 'hi'
            this.newProperty = 1
        }
    }
    var i = new Installer()
            ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS7009: 'new' expression, whose target lacks a construct signature, implicitly has an 'any' type.
    i.newProperty = i.args // ok, number ==> number | undefined
